title: Introduction to Networking
description: Learn the fundamentals of computer networking, including types of networks, key components, topologies, protocols, and devices. A beginner-friendly guide to understanding how networks connect and communicate.

title: Understanding IP Addressing and Subnetting
description: Master the concepts of IP addressing and subnetting â€” the foundation of network communication. Learn how IPs identify devices, how subnet masks organize networks, and how to design efficient subnets for real-world applications.
